title: New: How To Dress Well – & It Was U
content:
I’m fairly sure that I want Tom Krell to sing at my wedding… or funeral… whichever comes first.

With his debut LP Love Remains still a regular on my evening playlists, upcoming sophomore record Total Loss is shaping up rather nicely. New cut & It Was U (premiered via NPR) has more than a whiff of Prince about it; slick, funky and unashamedly pop. It may not be especially complicated nor technical, but there are few around doing this better than Krell is.

How To Dress Well – & It Was U
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
